summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of photo collage application. All 10 layout templates working correctly including the special 4+1 layout with proper proportions (1 large photo + 4 small photos in 2x2 grid). Backend APIs fully functional (8/8 tests passed). Company header with logo, name, and motto working perfectly. Paper orientation, photo editing tools, and PDF generation all functional. Modern UI with professional design and hover effects.
passed_tests: All 8 backend API endpoints (photo upload, get photos, photo file retrieval, letterhead upload, get letterheads, image processing, PDF generation, photo deletion)
All 10 layout templates: 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 2x3, 3x2, Portrait, Landscape, 1+2 Landscape, 1+2 Portrait, 4+1
Layout 4+1 with correct proportions: 1 large photo (left) + 4 small photos (right 2x2 grid)
Company header functionality: name input, motto input, logo upload, preview integration
Paper orientation selection (Portrait/Landscape) with preview changes
Photo management: upload dropzone, photo list display, photo deletion
Photo editing tools: rotation buttons, brightness/contrast sliders, grayscale and sharpen filters
PDF generation and download with proper filename (company name + date)
Modern UI design with gradient backgrounds, card shadows, and professional appearance
Button hover effects and active states throughout the interface
Responsive layout and compact menu design
Drag & drop area with proper hover interactions
Photo selection for editing with tools panel appearing
Layout changes reflected immediately in collage preview
Company header preview showing logo + name + motto in collage
